Hi all,

using heritrix 1.2:

When using the org.archive.crawler.writer.ARC=
WriterProcessor in the
default profile on e.g. http://www.atcomp.cz/webserv=
ices/dokumenty.asmx
(UTF-8) I end up with an archive file containing instea=
d of:

Vrac=ED seznam koncov=FDch

Vrac=C3=AD seznam koncov=C3=BDch

I am n=
ot sure where start looking at the issue, can someone give me a
pointer?

T=
he servers char-set claim is correctly utf8, I am running a debian
system..=
..

thanks
  Holger
